summary: Project includes SOS behavior with periodic coordinate refresh and radius-based logic; adjust refresh interval and radius parameters.

existing_features.title: Change the coordinate refresh/update interval to 12 seconds wherever the app periodically sends or refreshes location coordinates (ambulance and police location updates, and police-side polling of nearby ambulance locations). Update any user-facing text that mentions the old interval so it matches 12 seconds.

Change the SOS targeting radius from 20 meters to 30 meters. Update backend SOS targeting logic to use 30 meters when selecting police units, and update ambulance UI copy that references the radius so it says 30 meters.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change coordinate refresh interval to 12 seconds and set radius to 30 meters

projectName: Update coordinate refresh interval to 12s and SOS radius to 30m
